about_the_game:
Overview:
22Minutes is a timed game in which players will immediately delve into the action, with enemies and obstacles hiding around every corner. You must uncover their patterns and strategies for defeating them. The game's main environment contains indications and evidence pointing to a mystery, which players must uncover. From machinery to out-of-place constructions, everything points the player in the direction of understanding the explanation and, finally, completing the game.

Summary:

●You only have 22 minutes to learn from your mistakes and rejoin the game after each round, whether you die or run out of time.

● Clues are hidden around the worlds for the player to discover.

●Across the landscape, you will encounter flesh and mechanical foes that will attempt to stymie you; these are hurdles that the player must overcome with the use of items gathered from across the map.

● Every attempt develops the storyline and eventually leads to you finishing the game.
